content: Phil is a postdoctoral researcher in the Raj Lab (Dept. of Bioengineering, U. Penn). His research is guided towards fundamental understanding of virus-host interactions and tissue dynamics during and after infection.
summary: Phil is a postdoctoral researcher in the Raj Lab (Dept. of Bioengineering, U. Penn). His research is guided towards fundamental understanding of virus-host interactions and tissue dynamics during and after infection.
title: Phil Burnham
